Home » 39P4 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4) » 4 Kusalattika, Āsavaparāmāsagocchaka » 4.1 Kusalattika, Āsavaduka » 4.1.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetu-ārammaṇa
Kusalattika, Āsavaparāmāsagocchaka
Kusalattika, Āsavaduka
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu-ārammaṇa
5.
1237Kusalo noāsavo dhammo kusalassa noāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
1238Akusalo noāsavo dhammo akusalassa noāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
1239Abyākato noāsavo dhammo abyākatassa noāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
1240Kusalo noāsavo dhammo kusalassa noāsavassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
6.
1241Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa…pe…  avigate terasa. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
